name: DownloadSecureFile
description: Download a secure file to a temporary location on the agent machine
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: secureFile
inputs.label: Secure File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the secure file to download to a temporary location on the agent. The file will be cleaned up after the pipeline runs.

outputVariables.name: secureFilePath
outputVariables.description: The location of the secure file that was downloaded.
